response.job_title: Power Systems Planning and Operation Analysis
response.summary:
An excellent work ethic, results-oriented professional interested in innovative, economic and nature-friendly solutions that fulfil the energy needs of society by means of Electrical, Electronic and Software-based Systems.

An engineer highly skilled in electrical power systems: modelling, expansion and optimal operation planning, protection and control, and disturbance analysis. This considering national and international regulations for power grids having conventional and renewable energy sorces (RES). An agent of change in the energy transition through the integration of electrical power systems with Power Electronics (inverter-based resources -IBRs, SVCs, STATCOMs, FACTS), communication systems (SCADA, IoT), embedded systems (PMUs, IEDs, PQ monitors), and Analytics for decision making (Data Science).

A team/independent player and leader committed to excellence and continuous improvement.
response.skills: Analytical Skills, Project Management, Research and Development (R&D), Electrical Engineering, Programming, Power Systems, Power Electronics, Telecommunications, Statistics, Continuous Improvement, Optimization, Smart Grid, Modeling, Python (Programming Language), MATLAB, SQL, Java, C++, Cisco IOS, Linux

profile_positions.description:
Week-ahead operations planning for the Colombian bulk power system:
*Operation planning: Electrical, operational and resource-adequacy analysis for a reliable and secure operation of the nation-wide power system (<= 500 kV).
*Outage coordination: Transmission (TSOs) & Generation (GOs) Outages Scheduling to ensure feasible economic-dispatch scenarios.
*Tests coordination: Generators capability curve (Hydro-thermal generators, PV and Wind generators), static and dynamic reactive compensator setings (SVCs, Statcom, SSSC).
*Software and additional resources: PowerFactory-DIgSILENT (DPL), Python, SQL Server, SP7 (SCADA), VBA.
profile_positions.title: Short-term Operations Planning Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Electrical power systems studies:
*Operation analysis and expansion planning of electrical power systems at subtransmission and distribution levels (<=110 kV), including the interconnection of renewable energy sources (solar, hydro).
*Modelling and automated simulations of electrical power systems in PowerFactory-DIgSILENT, Neplan, EMTP-ATP, ETAP, Matlab/Simulink (Python, C++, C#, SQL, VBA).
*Expansion and operation studies: economic dispatch and optimal power flow, short circuit and arc flash, steady-state and transient stability, transients and power quality, protections and relay coordination, technical losses and reactive compensation, grounding/earthing systems, and economic selection of projects.
profile_positions.title: Power Systems Studies Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Optimization and software development:
-Modelling and solution of optimization problems for power systems operation planning (Security-Constrained Optimal Power Flow, Unit Commitment)
-Parallel computing and Big Data scripts using Matlab and Python.
-LAMP server implementation
-Web development (Python, html, CSS 3)
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Modern Power Quality disturbances in customer-side installations:
-Waveform distortion above 2 kHz
-Power Line Communication - PLC
-Advanced Metering Infrastructure - AMI
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Research on supraharmonics (waveform distortion btw 2-150 kHz):
-Time, frequency and statistical signal processing techniques (Time series and spectral analysis)
-Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) issues in low voltage installations from power electronics
-Current and voltage conducted emissions at low and medium frequency ranges (LF, MF, 2-150 kHz)
profile_positions.title: Research Internship

profile_positions.description:
Team management and Editorial Process management in a scientific journal:
-Budget planning and execution
-Editorial tasks supervision
-Digital content
profile_positions.title: Editorial Manager

profile_positions.description:
Editorial process in a scientific journal:
-Administrative tasks
-Indexation
-Publication
-Peer Reviewers database
profile_positions.title: Editorial Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Maintenance of electrical and electronic equipment in a textile factory:
-PLC programming
-Temperature and humidity conditioning using control systems
-Preventive/corrective maintenance of automatic loom machines
-Preventive/corrective maintenance in motor drives and lighting systems
profile_positions.title: Electrical and electronic equipment maintenance

company.name: XM SA ESP
company.description:
XM es la filial de ISA especializada en la Gestión Sistemas de Tiempo Real.

Su actuación se desarrolla en el marco de una mega tendencia que el mundo ha denominado “ciudades inteligentes”, ciudades en las que las “redes inteligentes” operan como sistemas de tiempo real que permiten el control y la operación de procesos complejos de gran impacto como son: el tránsito urbano o el despacho de la energía eléctrica. 

La Gestión de Sistemas de Tiempo Real, que consiste en la planeación, diseño, optimización, puesta en servicio, operación, administración o gerenciamiento de sistemas transaccionales o plataformas tecnológicas, que involucran el intercambio de información con valor agregado, y mercados de bienes y servicios relacionados. 

Organización Actual 

Gerente General :Luis Alejandro Camargo Suan 
Secretaría General y Asuntos Regulatorios: Sonía Margarita Abuchar 
Gerencia Nuevos Negocios: Ricardo Arango 
Gerencia CND: María Nohemí Arboleda 
Gerencia Operaciones Financieras: Cecilia Maya
Gerencia Información y Tecnología: Joaquín F. Yepes
